vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.12;
son of: Eshton (H0850);
brother of: Paseah (H6454) and Tehinnah (H8468)
§ Beth-rapha = "house of healing"
the son of Eshton
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Estón; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伯拉巴 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "醫治之家"
伊施屯的兒子 (代上4:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
伯拉巴 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "医治之家"
伊施屯的儿子 (代上4:12)
